effect_entries.effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Kick)

flavor_text_entries.text:
放走对手，强制拉后备宝可梦上场。
如果对手为野生宝可梦，
战斗将直接结束。

相手を　逃がして
控えの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。
野生の　場合は　戦闘が　終わる。

The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against
a single Pokémon.

Il bersaglio lascia il campo e viene sostituito.
Mette fine alle lotte contro singoli Pokémon
selvatici.

Asusta tanto al objetivo que tiene que cambiarse
por otro de su grupo. Si es un Pokémon salvaje,
el combate acaba.

Das Ziel wird in die Flucht geschlagen und durch
ein anderes Pokémon ersetzt. Ein Kampf gegen ein
wildes Pokémon wird beendet.

Effraie le Pokémon ennemi et le remplace par
un autre. Lors d’un combat contre un Pokémon
sauvage seul, met fin au combat.

趕走對手，強制讓後備寶可夢上場。
對手為野生寶可夢時，戰鬥將直接結束。

상대를 도망가게 해서
교대할 포켓몬을 끌어낸다.
야생의 경우에는 배틀이 끝난다.

あいてを　にがして
ひかえの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。
やせいの　ばあいは　せんとうが　おわる。

相手を　逃がして
控えの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。
野生の　場合は　戦闘が　終わる。

The target is scared off and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild,
this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

Il bersaglio lascia il campo e viene sostituito.
Mette fine alle lotte contro singoli Pokémon
selvatici.

Ataque de dos turnos. En el primer turno se
concentra luz, y en el segundo se canaliza en
un rayo para atacar.

Der Brüller schlägt das Ziel in die Flucht. Ein
Kampf gegen ein wildes Pokémon wird beendet.

Effraie le Pokémon ennemi et le remplace par
un autre. Dans la nature, met fin au combat.

상대를 도망가게 해서
교대할 포켓몬을 끌어낸다.
야생의 경우에는 배틀이 끝난다.

あいてを　にがして　ひかえポケモンを
ひきずりだす。　やせいポケモンなら
せんとうは　おわる。

The target is scared off and replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

The target is scared off and replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

Effraie le Pokémon visé et le
remplace par un autre. Dans
la nature, met fin au combat.

The foe is scared off, to be replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

The foe is scared off, to be replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

The foe is scared off, to be replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

The foe is made to
switch out with an
ally. In the wild,
the battle ends.

A savage roar that
makes the foe flee 
to end the battle.

A savage roar that
makes the foe flee 
to end the battle.
